WHY ASC360?


ASC360 provides

local rescue teams

presence in Nepal

Evacuated more than

200 people, from

emergency situations

ASC360 has on Call

medical advisory and

evacuation assistance
 

Settled accidental &

sickness claims &

multiple death claims

Established India’s first

High Altitude Medical & Rescue

center on Stok

Kangri’s Base camp

Cashless hospitalization

and evacuation all

across Nepal

Wish you a safe trek!

Best Regards

Prateek Gupta

CEO, ASC360

Making Outdoors Safe n Secure


Contact us: +91 84487 65102 | info@asc360.com


Disclaimer: Adventure Sports Cover 360 is providing comprehensive adventure safety assistance services including adventure insurance as add on for the adventure sports activities around the world. The insurance is provided via licensed agent by IRDA and SAR (Search and Rescue) assistance is provided by the Adventure Sports Cover 360.

Embark on your journey and be prepared for an emergency. Choose the right cover for your adventure. We've got customised policy features with enough information according to the level of coverage..

PLEASE NOTE:
This plan is valid for trekking and mountaineering upto 7500mts in India.
Any claim due to or arising out of pre-existing diseases/ailments whether declared or undeclared is NOT covered under the policy.

Claims Procedure: In the event of an accident or sudden illness or any other claim (cashless or reimbursement) caused by a contingency covered under the insurance policy, immediately contact the Help Line number stating the necessary details.


Claims Assistance & Evacuation assistance ASC360: +91-7303800101 or Email: info@asc360.com


IMPORTANT NOTE: This certificate has to be read in conjunction with the Terms & Conditions, coverage and exclusions, which is available with HDFC ERGO and ASC360 a brand of MISSON OUTDOORS. You may email us at customersupport@hdfcergo.com. In case of any product related query, please call us at 1800 2666 (Toll Free and accessible in India only).


NOTE: In case you find any variation between the information provided by you and the details as mentioned in the policy certificate, kindly contact us immediately.
